lead_paragraph: The five suspects were cleared after inconsistencies began to emerge in their accuser’s statements to investigators about an encounter on Jan. 7.

headline.print_headline: Judge Dismisses Charges in Brooklyn Rape Case as Accounts Diverge
headline.main: Judge Dismisses Charges Against Teenagers in Brooklyn Rape Case

snippet: The five suspects were cleared after inconsistencies began to emerge in their accuser’s statements to investigators about an encounter on Jan. 7.
abstract: Brooklyn Criminal Court Judge John T Hecht dismisses charges against five teenagers facing accusations of having raped 18-year-old woman at playground in Brownsville neighborhood.
